= Introduction =

In theory, we have several pairs antennas with shifting (from the point of view of sources), and a measurement of visibilities (complex cross-correlations) for each baseline. Taking a two-dimensional Fourier Transform of the visibilities, we get an intensity map of the sky in two dimensions
